text: King David ga helekai gi dana dama daane Solomon, “Gi hagadagadagagee ge gi de madagu. Daamada ina di moomee. Hudee dumaalia gi tei mee gi haga deaadee ina goe. Yihowah God28.20 Di ingoo o God deenei le e hai dono hadinga bolo “Yihowah di God dela e noho i baahi ana daangada” go dogu God, ga madalia goe. Mee hagalee hudu goe gi daha, gei e noho hua i do baahi gaa dae loo gi dau Hale Daumaha la gaa lawa.
